title: Making Rad: Muc-Off Mixes Up Plastic-Free Pink Punk Powder Bike Cleaner
content:
It’s about time — time that cycling caught on to eco-friendly cleaning solutions. Today, the chemistry crew at Muc-Off released an industry first: plastic-free bike cleaner. Muc-Off calls it “Punk Powder”, and it’s the pinkest green product we’ve seen … maybe ever. Let’s give it a scrub down. Punk Powder, a Greener Bike Cleaner Muc-Off […]

The post Making Rad: Muc-Off Mixes Up Plastic-Free Pink Punk Powder Bike Cleaner appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jilli Cluff
